body:
Comment 3: 
With golang.org I get currently what you expect: http://golang.org/pkg/net/#IPConn .
Same with the command line. And same with the locally running godoc, freshly compiled.

In fact, I cannot reproduce this particular problem for darwin/amd64. Please
double-check you're running the latest version.

That said, the issue is still real: Different types exist for different low-level
packages and godoc may not show the right ones. But your example doesn't seem valid.
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
